item.title: Web Development
item.description: It’s great to have your business in a place where customers can find you with a quick glance at their phone. Give us a call to help you out with, oh any websites you’ve ever dreamed up in your wildest dreams

item.title: Refactoring
item.description: Refactoring your website means making changes to your code base that reduce the size, decrease the hassle of bringing someone new to work on it, and enable you to keep up to speed with fast changing technologies.
